summary: Phase 5 UI changes testing completed successfully. All features verified working: purple theme removed from observer notes, notes panel collapsed by default, relative timestamps (MM:SS) working in Live Observation and Review Timeline, iPad portrait mode optimized.

known_behaviors.behavior: Old sessions show wall-clock time in Timeline tab
known_behaviors.reason: Events recorded before Phase 5 don't have relativeTimestamp field, so they correctly fallback to wall-clock time display

known_behaviors.behavior: Session auth expires quickly during testing
known_behaviors.reason: Short JWT token expiration or session timeout - this is by design but makes testing cumbersome

observer_notes_no_purple_styling.details: Notes button classes: bg-white hover:bg-slate-50 border-slate-300 - No purple found

observer_notes_collapsed_by_default.details: Notes panel NOT visible on page load, showNotesPanel initialized as false

observer_notes_panel_header_no_purple.details: Panel header classes: bg-slate-50 rounded-t-lg - No purple background

relative_timestamp_in_live_observation.details: Event timestamp shows '00:01' format (MM:SS) in last event panel

relative_timestamp_in_observer_notes.details: Notes panel shows relative time using formatRelativeTime function

relative_timestamp_in_review_timeline.details: New sessions show '00:01', '00:02' format in Timeline tab (events with relativeTimestamp)

ipad_portrait_no_horizontal_overflow.details: scrollWidth (768) equals windowWidth (768) - no horizontal scroll

code_verification.notes_panel_default_false: useState(false) at line 55 confirms collapsed by default

format_relative_time_function.LiveObservation.jsx: Line 316 - formatRelativeTime defined, used at lines 1024, 1142
format_relative_time_function.ReviewSession.jsx: Line 32 - formatRelativeTime defined, used at line 1372

code_verification.ipad_portrait_css: CSS media queries added at lines 161-338 in index.css

seed_data_creation: Created test session session_1771075987833_lgf74kszh with 2 events for timeline testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 5 UI changes fully tested and working. Key findings: 1) Purple theme fully removed from observer notes UI, 2) Notes panel defaults to collapsed state, 3) Relative timestamps (MM:SS) working for new sessions with relativeTimestamp field - old sessions correctly fallback to wall-clock time, 4) iPad portrait mode (768x1024) displays properly without overflow and with proper touch targets. Session auth expires quickly so tests need to be done in single continuous script.
